Today on the Dingle Peninsula, it's looking good with 3 ft @9s NNW swell and a moderate 11 mph NNW wind. Best spots include Ballybunion Right and Ballybunion Beach, both offering fun conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 4 ft @7s N swell and fresh 25 mph N winds, making it blown out and poor. The day after continues the trend with similar blown-out conditions at 4 ft @7s NW and 23 mph SW winds. Best: today.
